case_names: ERIC PORTER v. A JUSTICE OF THE DISTRICT COURT DEPARTMENT
summaries: The petitioner, Eric Porter, acting pro se, filed a petition in the nature of quo warranto in the county court, pursuant to G. L. c. 249, § 6. The petition sought to contest the constitutionality of the respondent's authority to serve as a justice in the District Court after the age of seventy under G. L. c. 32, § 65G (recall statute).
